chefs.description: A chef is a professional cook who is trained in the art of food preparation and specializes in creating and designing dishes. They may work in a variety of settings, such as restaurants, hotels, or catering companies, and are responsible for managing kitchen staff, ordering ingredients, and creating menus. Chefs often have years of culinary experience and may have received formal training at a culinary school or through an apprenticeship. They use their knowledge of cooking techniques and ingredients to create flavorful and visually appealing dishes that are enjoyed by diners.

recipes.cooking_method: Preheat the oven to 425°F.Pat the chicken dry and season generously with salt and pepper. Stuff the chicken with the lemon wedges and garlic. Rub the chicken all over with the olive oil and sprinkle with dried thyme. Roast in the preheated oven for 1 hour to 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F. Let the chicken rest for 10-15 minutes before carving and serving.
